get.description:
Get all available model providers with their configuration details.

Returns:
- List of providers with their metadata and configuration schema
- Only returns providers that are marked as active and enabled

schema.title: Response Get Available Providers Api V2 Redteam Model Providers  Get

get.description:
Get all available frameworks with their sub-frameworks and categories.

Returns:
- Complete framework hierarchy including all subframeworks and categories
- Only returns active frameworks by default, but includes all subframeworks regardless of active status

Get frameworks filtered by type (regulatory or domain).

Returns:
- Frameworks of the specified type
- With complete hierarchy of sub-frameworks and categories (all subframeworks included regardless of active status)

Get a specific framework by ID with all its sub-frameworks and categories.

Returns:
- Complete framework details including all subframeworks and categories
- Only returns if framework is active
Get redteam run summary with defence rate and prompt count
Get metrics grouped by OWASP category and subcategory
Get redteam conversations with pagination
Get turns for a multi-turn redteam run, optionally filtered by category/subcategory
Get all redteam runs for a space with pagination

post.description:
Upload trace files to S3 and create a TraceSource record.

Files are stored in S3 under: bucket_name/trace_source_id/filename
The uploaded_files field contains the S3 URLs for all uploaded files.

Args:
    files: List of uploaded files (.jsonl or .pb.gz)
    space_id: Space ID for the trace source
    name: Name for the trace source
    description: Optional description for the trace source
    db: Database session
    auth: Authentication dependency

Returns:
    Created TraceSource record with uploaded_files field containing S3 URLs

get.description:
Get a trace source by ID.

Args:
    trace_source_id: TraceSource ID
    db: Database session
    auth: Authentication dependency

Returns:
    TraceSource record

Get all trace sources for a space.

Args:
    space_id: Space ID
    db: Database session
    auth: Authentication dependency

Returns:
    List of TraceSource records

schema.title: Response List Trace Sources Api V2 Agentic Trace Sources Space  Space Id  Get

post.description:
Upload tool registry files to S3 and create a ToolRegistry record.

Files are stored in S3 under: bucket_name/tools/tool_registry_id/filename
The uploaded_files field contains the S3 URLs for all uploaded files.
Accepts .json and .yaml/.yml files.

Args:
    files: List of uploaded files (.json or .yaml/.yml)
    space_id: Space ID for the tool registry
    name: Name for the tool registry
    version: Optional version
    description: Optional description for the tool registry
    db: Database session
    auth: Authentication dependency

Returns:
    Created ToolRegistry record with uploaded_files field containing S3 URLs

get.description:
Get a tool registry by ID.

Args:
    tool_registry_id: ToolRegistry ID
    db: Database session
    auth: Authentication dependency

Returns:
    ToolRegistry record

Get all tool registries for a space.

Args:
    space_id: Space ID
    db: Database session
    auth: Authentication dependency

Returns:
    List of ToolRegistry records

schema.title: Response List Tool Registries Api V2 Agentic Tool Registries Space  Space Id  Get

post.description:

Args:
    payload: Trace source connection details

post.description:
AWS Marketplace will POST here with `x-amzn-marketplace-token` in the body.
Resolves the token and redirects to Auth0 with state containing AWS customer info.

get.description:
Handle Auth0 callback and link Auth0 user/org to AWS Account ID + ProductCode.

This endpoint:
1. Exchanges Auth0 code for user info
2. Creates or finds the Auth0 user
3. Links the AWS Marketplace customer to the Auth0 user
4. If customer_aws_account_id exists  link user to existing org; else create new org
5. Sanitizes org domain when deriving from email
6. Redirects to dashboard

post.description:
Handle AWS Marketplace SNS events:
- SubscriptionConfirmation
- Notification (subscribe/unsubscribe)
- UnsubscribeConfirmation
